title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
**Description:**

Introducing the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit in the color black! This amazing product from ZEBRA is perfect for use in various industries such as Retail and Hospitality. 

With its ergonomic design and lightweight structure, this handheld device provides comfort and ease of use. It is compatible with both laptops and desktop computers, offering flexibility in its connectivity. You can connect it easily to your device using the USB cable provided. 

You have multiple power options with this kit. You can choose to power it through a corded electric source, a USB cable, or with 3 AAA batteries. The battery type required is AAA.

Equipped with a 1D/2D imager scanner, this device is capable of capturing a wide range of barcodes and codes. It also features omni-directional scanning, ensuring accurate and efficient scanning from any angle. 

The Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit comes pre-configured for your convenience, making it ready to use right out of the box. Additionally, it includes auto-host cables, which further simplify the setup process. 

Don't miss out on this versatile and reliable product that will meet your general-purpose scanning needs. Upgrade your scanning experience with the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit from ZEBRA today!

Introducing the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit in striking black color from the esteemed brand ZEBRA. This product is designed for general purpose use and is ideal for industries such as retail and hospitality.

The Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit is compatible with both laptops and desktops, providing versatility in its usage. It can be powered through various sources including corded electric, USB cable, or 3 AAA batteries, offering flexibility in different situations.

Equipped with a USB cable for connectivity, this device ensures seamless data transfer. The scanner type is a cutting-edge 1D/2D imager, enabling efficient and accurate scanning for a wide range of barcodes.

The Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit boasts an ergonomic design, making it comfortable to hold and use for extended periods. It is also lightweight, ensuring ease of use and reducing fatigue.

Notable features of this product include its omni-directional scanning capability, which enables quick and effortless scanning from any angle. Additionally, it comes pre-configured for hassle-free setup, allowing you to start using it right out of the box.

For added convenience, the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit includes auto-host cables, simplifying the connection process. It also offers aim line guidance, further enhancing user experience.

Choose the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit for a reliable and efficient scanning solution. Experience the quality and performance of ZEBRA's innovative technology.
